faction_profile.name: 북해빙궁 (North Sea Ice Palace / 北海氷宮)

location.real_world_reference: Lake Baikal (Russia) or Por-Bajin Ruins (Tuva Republic).
location.environment: Eternal Winter. Blizzards and frozen lakes where normal humans freeze to death instantly.

demographics.ethnicity: Saekmokin (Semuren / Colored-eye people). Often depicted with Western features (Blonde/Silver hair, Blue eyes).
demographics.gender_ratio: Often Matriarchal or Female-dominated due to the Yin-nature of their arts.

status.goal: Survival in the cold, or invading the warm Central Plains (Jungwon).
status.conflict: Seeking 'Extreme Yang' elixirs to cure their genetic curse.

genetic_trait.name: 구음절맥 (Nine Yin Severed Meridians / 九陰絶脈)
genetic_trait.description: A congenital condition where excessive Yin Qi blocks the meridians.
genetic_trait.pros: Unrivaled talent for Ice/Yin martial arts.
genetic_trait.cons: Terminal illness. Most die young unless treated with extreme Yang energy.
genetic_trait.cure_quest: Requires legendary Yang elixirs or Dual Cultivation with a Yang master.

combat_style.effect: Freezes opponent's blood, slows movement, shatters weapons with cold.
combat_style.visuals: White/Blue Qi, frost forming on the ground, falling snow.

list.name: 빙천수라마공 (Ice Heaven Asura Demon Art)
list.grade: Supreme. Turns the user into a living ice statue.

list.name: 빙천백옥수 (Ice Heaven White Jade Hand)
list.effect: Hands become hard as jade and cold as absolute zero.

list: 한빙백골소혼장 (Cold Ice White Bone Soul Melting Palm)

yang_elixirs.description: Necessary items to cure the Ice Palace's curse (Gu-eum Jeol-maek).
list: 만년화령과 (Ten Thousand Year Fire Spirit Fruit)

narrative_role: The 'Tragic Heroine' love interest who needs the protagonist's help to survive.
A powerful third-party invasion force that freezes everything in its path.
The source of 'Ice' element allies in a party.
A quest hub for high-level adventures (Journey to the North).
